title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 65.60 - Reconsideration
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 65.60 - Reconsideration

State Regulations
(a) An application
for reconsideration after a determination or decision made by the Board must be
filed with the Board in writing, with proof of service, and state the reasons
reconsideration should be granted by the Board. (b) Any objections to an application for
reconsideration must be filed, with proof of service, within 10 days after
service of the application for reconsideration. (c) The Board may, at any time, reopen a
proceeding or require a hearing. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
65.60

Adopted

New

York State Register March 30, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 13, eff. 3/30/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
